name: Cal-Maine Foods, Inc.
description: Cal-Maine Foods, Inc. is the largest producer and distributor of shell eggs in the United States, dedicated to providing high-quality, nutritious eggs to consumers. Founded in 1969 and headquartered in Jackson, Mississippi, the company has grown through strategic acquisitions and its commitment to innovative farming practices. Cal-Maine operates in a vertically integrated model, managing every aspect of production from feed mills to egg processing and distribution. The company produces a range of egg products, including conventional, cage-free, organic, and nutritionally enhanced eggs, catering to a diverse customer base that includes grocery chains, food service companies, and distributors. With a strong focus on animal welfare and sustainable farming practices, Cal-Maine is committed to meeting evolving consumer preferences while maintaining high standards of quality and safety. The company continuously invests in technology and facilities to enhance operational efficiency and reduce its environmental footprint. Cal-Maine's mission is to be the preferred supplier of quality eggs while fostering a culture of safety, sustainability, and corporate responsibility. The company plays a vital role in the food supply chain, ensuring that eggs are available to consumers across the nation, and is recognized for its leadership in the egg industry.

seo.meta_title: Cal-Maine Foods, Inc. | Leading Producer of Shell Eggs
seo.meta_description: Cal-Maine Foods, Inc. is the largest producer of shell eggs in the U.S., offering a variety of egg products while prioritizing sustainability and quality. Learn more about our mission and products.

faq.answer: Cal-Maine produces conventional, cage-free, organic, and nutritionally enhanced eggs.
